title: I'm on a Pixel 3, with Android 11 Beta. I can't use Google pay despite it my device is certified
content:
Google Pay 

I'm on a Pixel 3, with Android 11 Beta. I'm getting an error saying, "Your phone doesn't meet software standards". When I click the e help link it takes me to an article saying I need to check in Google Play settings if my device is certified, which it says it is. 

This is obviously having to do with Android 11 beta being installed, but thought you should know.
